mcq.statement: Which dam diverts water from the Kishanganga (Neelum) River to a power plant in the Jhelum River basin?
mcq.one_liner: The dam that diverts water from the Kishanganga (Neelum) River to the Jhelum River basin is the **Kishanganga Dam**.

suggestions.topic: Indian Dams violating Indus Water Treaty
Indian Dams violating Indus Water Treaty
